Description: * {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s HP increases by 0.5% per minute
* {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s damage increases by 0.5% per minute
* {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s base damage reduced by 30%
* Hard {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} now take +20% more {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} damage
* Sprint/Out of Combat regen timer against {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=neutrals}} increased from 2.5s to 4s (takes longer to start sprinting/regening)
* Sprint ramp rate reduced from 1/sec to 0.75/sec (first +3 sprint is immediate, then it starts ramping)
* {{PageRef|Walker}}s and {{PageRef|Mid-Boss|alt_name=Mid Boss}} now have +15% Bullet Resistance and -15% HP
* {{PageRef|Walker}} ally aura (grants +15% Bullet and Spirit Resist) range reduced from 32m to 28m
* Getting shot now slows your move speed by 10% for 0.7s
* When using Spectate teammate buttons (F1-F5) your camera angles are no longer overridden by your teammates
* Fix for FOV "pop" in {{PageRef|Vindicta}}'s Assassination
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} no longer works against {{PageRef|Sinner's Sacrifice}}
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Blasted}} Max Health {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} spirit scaling reduced from 0.78 to 0.7
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Chain Gang}} will now break slightly faster when target is out of LOS
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Chain Gang}} can no longer be broken by mantling
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: Base bullet damage reduced from 22.25 to 19.5
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Pulse}} range spirit scaling reduced from 0.256 to 0.2
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: Base bullet damage reduced from 6.2 to 5.5
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: Bullet falloff range from 20-58 to 18-55
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Afterburn}} now only adds 0.5s to the duration for each bullet that is hit after it procs, rather than fully refreshing the duration. Adds 1.0s for headshots.
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: Rage now builds 8% slower
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Card Trick}} spirit scaling reduced from 1.2 to 1.0
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: Card Toss T2 reduced from +40 Damage to +35
* {{PageRef|Fleetfoot}}: Speed duration reduced from 6s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Express Shot}}: No longer has a no shooting for 3s requirement
* {{PageRef|Express Shot}}: Now has a 8s cooldown
* {{PageRef|Express Shot}}: Primary fire damage reduced from 170% to 125%
* {{PageRef|Express Shot}}: Secondary fire damage reduced from 45% to 35%
* {{PageRef|Express Shot}}: Ammo drain reduced from 40% to 30%
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Bullet damage returned increased from 50% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Focus Lens}}: Cooldown increased from 38s to 45s
